contents.name: new
_meta_P5LIVE
contents.code:
/*	P5LIVE_meta // cc teddavis.org 2019	*/

let fontPath = 'includes/fonts/RobotoMono-Regular.ttf',
	fg, bg, pg, y = 0,
	w = 0,
	fc = 0,
	c = [0, 0, 255],
	rBox = 0,
	c1 = 0,
	c2 = 255,
	dx = 7,
	dy = 4,
	font

function preload() {
	font = loadFont(fontPath)
}

function setup() {
	createCanvas(windowWidth, windowHeight, WEBGL)
	background(0)
	noFill()
	fill(255)
	noStroke()
	fg = createGraphics(width, height)
	bg = createGraphics(width, height)
	pg = createGraphics(width, height)
	buildBox(fg)
	buildBox(bg)
	buildBox(pg)
	textFont(font)
	textSize(48)
	textAlign(CENTER, BOTTOM)
}

function draw() {
	background(0)
	orbitControl(5)

	rotateX(radians(0))
	rotateY(radians(sin(fc * 0.005) * 25))

	scale(0.57)

	if(frameCount % 8 === 0) {
		y += 20
		if(y > height) {
			y = 0
			buildBox(fg)
			c = [random(255), random(255), random(255)]
			c1 = random(255)
			c2 = random(255)
			let dd = 4
			dx = floor(random(1, dd))
			dy = floor(random(1, dd))
			buildBox(bg)
		}
		fg.fill(255)
		fg.noStroke()
		if(random(1) > 0.25)
			fg.rect(0, y, random(50, 350), 15)
	}

	bg.fill(c1)
	bg.stroke(c2)
	bg.strokeWeight(1)
	bg.ellipse(frameCount * dx % width, fc * dy % height, 50 + sin(fc * 0.03) * 250)



	push()
	translate(0, 0, -100)
	buildFont('p5.js', -width / 2)
	texture(bg)
	plane(bg.width, bg.height)
	pop()

	buildFont('ace-editor', -width / 2)
	texture(fg)
	plane(fg.width, fg.height)

	push()
	translate(0, 0, 100)
	buildFont('P5LIVE', -width / 2)
	pg.clear()
	buildBox(pg)
	push()
	pg.noStroke()
	pg.fill(150, 100)
	pg.rect(pg.width - 1, 1, -pg.width * 0.2, pg.height - 2)
	pop()
	pg.noFill()
	pg.stroke(150)
	pg.strokeWeight(1)

	// p5live
	buildGUI('P5LIVE', pg.height * 0.025, pg.height * 0.08)

	// cocoding
	buildGUI('COCODING', pg.height * 0.125, pg.height * 0.08)

	// sketches
	buildGUI('SKETCHES', pg.height * 0.225, pg.height * 0.73)

	let sketchH = pg.height * 0.02
	let sc = 0
	for(let i = 0; i < pg.height * 0.65; i += sketchH) {
		pg.noStroke()
		pg.fill(60)
		if(sc % 3 === 0 || sc % 4 === 0) {
			pg.fill(30)
		}
		pg.rect(pg.width * 0.99, pg.height * 0.225 + pg.height * 0.08 + i, -pg.width * 0.18, sketchH)
		sc++
	}

	texture(pg)
	plane(pg.width, pg.height)
	pop()

	fc++
}

function buildGUI(label, yoffset, yheight) {
	pg.fill(80)
	pg.rect(pg.width * 0.99, yoffset, -pg.width * 0.18, yheight)
	pg.fill(30)
	pg.rect(pg.width * 0.99, yoffset, -pg.width * 0.18, pg.height * 0.03)
	pg.fill(200)
	pg.textSize(25)
	pg.text(label, pg.width * 0.99 - pg.width * 0.18 + 5, yoffset + 5, pg.width * 0.18, pg.height * 0.03)
}

function buildBox(tg) {
	tg.clear()
	tg.noFill()
	tg.stroke(255)
	tg.strokeWeight(3)
	tg.rect(1, 1, tg.width - 2, tg.height - 2)
}

function buildFont(txt, xoff) {
	push()
	let yoff = 50
	let slant = 50
	translate(xoff, -height / 2)
	fill(255)
	noStroke()
	text(txt, -slant, -yoff)

	stroke(255)
	line(0, 0, -slant, -yoff)
	noStroke()
	pop()
}

contents.name: _meta_P5LIVE_COCODING
contents.code:
/*	P5LIVE_COCODING_meta // cc teddavis.org 2019	*/

let fontPath = 'includes/fonts/RobotoMono-Regular.ttf',
	fg, bg, y = 0,
	w = 0,
	fc = 0,
	c = [0, 0, 255],
	rBox = 0,
	c1 = 0,
	c2 = 255,
	dx = 7,
	dy = 4,
	font

function preload() {
	font = loadFont(fontPath)
}

function setup() {
	createCanvas(windowWidth, windowHeight, WEBGL)
	background(0)
	noFill()
	fill(255)
	noStroke()
	fg = createGraphics(width / 4, height)
	bg = createGraphics(width, height)
	textFont(font)
	textSize(48)
	textAlign(CENTER, BOTTOM)
	buildBox(fg)
	buildBox(bg)
}

function draw() {
	background(0)
	orbitControl(5)
	rotateY(radians(sin(fc * .005) * 45))
	rotateX(radians(sin(fc * .0025) * 25))

	scale(.57)

	if(frameCount % 8 == 0) {
		y += 20
		if(y > height) {
			y = 0
			buildBox(fg)
			c = [random(255), random(255), random(255)]
			c1 = random(255)
			c2 = random(255)
			let dd = 4
			dx = floor(random(1, dd))
			dy = floor(random(1, dd))
		}
		fg.fill(255)
		fg.noStroke()
		if(random(1) > .25)
			fg.rect(0, y, random(50, 250), 15)
	}

	bg.fill(c1)
	bg.stroke(c2)
	bg.strokeWeight(1)
	bg.ellipse(frameCount * dx % width, fc * dy % height, 50 + sin(fc * .03) * 250)

	push()
	translate(0, 0, -abs(sin(fc * .0025)) * 250)
	buildFont('p5.js', -width / 2)

	texture(bg)
	plane(bg.width, bg.height)
	pop()


	let lc = 6
	if(random(1) > .99) {
		rBox = floor(random(lc))
	}
	
	for(let i = 0; i < lc; i++) {
		let x = map(i, 0, lc - 1, -width / 1.5, width / 1.5)
		push()
		translate(x, 0)

		if(rBox == i) {
			fill(0, 255, 0, 150)
			noStroke()
			plane(fg.width, fg.height)
		}

		buildFont('Coder ' + (i + 1), 0)
		texture(fg)
		plane(fg.width, fg.height)
		pop()
	}

	fc++
}

function buildBox(pg) {
	pg.clear()
	pg.noFill()
	pg.stroke(255)
	pg.strokeWeight(3)
	pg.rect(1, 1, pg.width - 2, pg.height - 2)
}

function buildFont(txt, xoff) {
	push()
	let yoff = 50
	let slant = 50
	translate(xoff, -height / 2)
	fill(255)
	noStroke()
	text(txt, -slant, -yoff)

	stroke(255)
	line(0, 0, -slant, -yoff)
	noStroke()
	pop()
}

_webgl_primatives
contents.code:
/*	_webgl_primatives // cc teddavis.org 2019	*/

let v = .3

function setup() {
	createCanvas(windowWidth, windowHeight, WEBGL)
	angleMode(DEGREES)
}

function draw() {
	background(0)
	orbitControl(5)

	ortho()

	if(mouseIsPressed) {
		lights()
		noStroke()
		fill(255)
	} else {
		stroke(255)
		noFill()
	}


	push()
	translate(rPos(0))
	rotateX(frameCount / 4)
	rotateZ(frameCount / 2)
	plane(150, 150)
	pop()

	push()
	translate(rPos(50))
	rotateX(frameCount / 4)
	rotateZ(frameCount / 2)
	box(150)
	pop()

	push()
	translate(rPos(100))
	rotateX(frameCount / 4)
	rotateY(frameCount / 4)
	sphere(100)
	pop()

	push()
	translate(rPos(150))
	rotateX(frameCount / 4)
	rotateY(frameCount / 4)
	ellipsoid(100, 30)
	pop()

	push()
	translate(rPos(200))
	rotateY(frameCount / 2)
	rotateX(frameCount / 3)
	cone(100, 150)
	pop()

	push()
	translate(rPos(250))
	rotateX(frameCount / 4)
	rotateZ(frameCount / 3)
	torus(100, 50)
	pop()

	push()
	translate(rPos(300))
	rotateY(frameCount / 2)
	rotateZ(frameCount / 4)
	cylinder(100, 100)
	pop()
}

function rPos(off) {
	let x = (sin(off + frameCount * v) * width / 3)
	let y = (cos(off + frameCount * v) * height / 3)
	return createVector(x, y)
}

_hydra_texture
_hydra_scope
contents.code:
/*	
	_hydra_scope // cc ojack.xyz + teddavis.org 2021	
	use scoped for hydra's noise() + other global p5 issues
*/

let libs = ['https://unpkg.com/hydra-synth', 'includes/libs/hydra-synth.js']

// hydra canvas + init
let hc = document.createElement('canvas') // hydra canvas + custom size
hc.width = 640
hc.height = 360
let hydra = new Hydra({
	detectAudio: false, // no mic
	canvas: hc, // use hydra canvas
	makeGlobal: false, // scoped
	autoLoop: false // custom tick() below
})
let synth = hydra.synth // scoped hydra

let pg // store hydra texture


// hydraSandbox - start
synth.noise(8, .5)
	.modulate(synth.noise(5), .3)
	.modulate(synth.osc(5, .1, .2), .3)
	.out()
// hydraSandbox - stop

function setup() {
	createCanvas(windowWidth, windowHeight, WEBGL)
	background(0)
	pg = createGraphics(hc.width, hc.height)
	noStroke()
}

function draw() {
	hydra.tick(1.5) // custom hydra animation speed!

	// grab + apply hydra texture
	pg.clear()
	pg.drawingContext.drawImage(hc, 0, 0, pg.width, pg.height)
	texture(pg)

	plane(width, height)

	rotateX(radians(frameCount / 8))
	rotateZ(radians(-frameCount / 6))
	box(height/3)
}

contents.name: _hydra_overlay
_hydra_feedback
contents.code:
/*	
	_hydra_scope // cc ojack.xyz + teddavis.org 2021	
	go wild sending p5 into hydra and pulling it back! 
*/

let libs = ['https://unpkg.com/hydra-synth']

let hc = document.createElement('canvas')
hc.width = window.innerWidth
hc.height = window.innerHeight
document.body.appendChild(hc)
let hydra = new Hydra({ detectAudio: false, canvas: hc })
let pg // store hydra texture

// hydraSandbox - start
src(o0)
	.layer(s0)
	.scroll(1.01, 1.01)
	.scale(1.01)
	.out()
// hydraSandbox  - stop

function setup() {
	createCanvas(windowWidth, windowHeight, WEBGL)
	background(0)
	pg = createGraphics(hc.width, hc.height)
	s0.init({src: drawingContext.canvas })
}

function draw() {
	clear()
	pg.drawingContext.drawImage(hc, 0, 0, pg.width, pg.height)

	rotateX(radians(frameCount*.4))

	fill(255)
	stroke(0)
	strokeWeight(.5)
	if(mouseIsPressed){
		fill(0)
		stroke(255)
	}
	torus(height/6, 20)
	
	rotateY(radians(frameCount*.8))
	
	noStroke()
	texture(pg) // haha why no likey
	torus(height/4, height/12)
}
